summary: This document appears to be internal email correspondence from July 26, 2019, between Bureau of Prisons staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status assessment and administrative award nominations. It shows routine prison administration communication shortly before Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the inmate who needs to be assessed, indicating he was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Epstein status assessment request
events.description: An associate warden requests notification when Jeffrey Epstein has been assessed so they can notify the RD (likely Regional Director).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is dated July 26, 2019, just days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Epstein was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York and required regular assessments.
The communication shows routine prison administration procedures regarding inmate monitoring.
The document includes a reference to award nominations being submitted to a supervisor's box.
The correspondence is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and appears to be internal Bureau of Prisons communication.
